segments.text: Can you change American dollars into French francs ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . How much do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fifty dollars . What is the exchange rate today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: One dollar to five francs . Is that all right ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please . And you can cash my traveler's check , can't you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to be here tomorrow . What are your business hours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 10 o'clock in the morning to 2 o'clock in the afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2
